full_summary:
### Tender Notice: W6889-230146 - Repair and Replacement of Electric Motors

#### Notice Details

| Section  | Value
|----------|--------------|
| Reference Number | WS3656900628-Doc3656959456 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3656900628 |
| Publication Date | September 22, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT |
| Trade Agreements | Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement |

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Petawawa is seeking a supplier for the repair and replacement of electric motors. The work under this requirement includes all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to perform troubleshooting, repairs, and replacement of alternating current (AC) and direct current (DC) motors and electric hand tools used at Garrison Petawawa.

#### Requirements and Specifications

The tender is for the repair and replacement of electric motors, including:

* Electric alternating current (AC) motors
* Electric direct current (DC) motors
* Hand tools
* Electrical system services

#### Certifications and Compliances

This tender is open to bidders who hold certifications related to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Nathalie Longtin at nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Call for Tender

The Department of National Defence at CFB Petawawa is seeking a supplier for the repair and replacement of electric motors. The tender submission deadline is October 17, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT.
